name: express-openapi-validator
description: Automatically validate API requests and responses with OpenAPI 3 and Express.

scripts.test: TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha -r source-map-support/register -r ts-node/register  --files --recursive -R spec test/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:windows: set TS_NODE_FILES=true & mocha -r source-map-support/register -r ts-node/register  --files --recursive test/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:coverage: TS_NODE_FILES=true nyc mocha -r source-map-support/register -r ts-node/register --recursive test/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:coverage:windows: set TS_NODE_FILES=true & nyc mocha -r source-map-support/register -r ts-node/register --recursive test/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:reset: rm -rf node_modules && npm i && npm run compile && npm t

author: Carmine DiMascio <cdimascio@gmail.com>
